channel.title: [Request] Clean PI Server
channel.description:
I request from anyone to give me a download link for a clean PI server and client to base on them...
I want these specifies:
- Not 307 graphics - No lagging and bugs - Minigames included (duel arena, pest control, clan wars, jad...) - Excellent PvP (no pvp bugs) - Working weapons and special attacks (such as Godswords, D claws, Dharok, Whips, etc...)
Hope you understood me guys. Thanks for your time!
Edit: anyone....? I really want a server ASAP
